statements: SELECT report_name, compliance_status FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT creation_date, report_name, regulatory_standards FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, creation_date FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, regulatory_standards FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE regulatory_standards LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT report_id, report_name, compliance_status, regulatory_standards, creation_date FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, regulatory_standards FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE regulatory_standards LIKE '%ISO%';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM RiskAssessmentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryStandards WHERE regulatory_body='EU'
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryStandards ORDER BY standard_name
SELECT report_id, compliance_status FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE regulations_met=True
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status, regulations_met FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT report_id, compliance_status, report_date, regulations_met FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT MAX(report_date), AVG(report_id), MIN(compliance_status), regulations_met FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT standard_name, description, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryStandards;
SELECT standard_id, description, regulatory_body, standard_name FROM RegulatoryStandards;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_standard FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE report_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceOfficers ORDER BY officer_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, department_name FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE department_name = 'Quality Assurance';
SELECT standard_name, agency_name, compliance_deadline FROM RegulatoryStandards ORDER BY compliance_deadline ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_standard, report_description FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_standard, report_description FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE compliance_standard = 'ISO 27001';
SELECT officer_name, officer_email, department_name FROM ComplianceOfficers ORDER BY officer_name DESC;
SELECT standard_name, agency_name, compliance_deadline FROM RegulatoryStandards WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports JOIN ComplianceOfficers ON RiskAssessmentReports.report_date = ComplianceOfficers.officer_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE risk_score > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM fintech_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, officer_email FROM compliance_officers WHERE officer_id = 1;
SELECT standard_name, compliance_level FROM regulatory_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE 'ISO%' ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_reports;
SELECT report_name, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM fintech_companies WHERE industry_sector = 'Fintech';
SELECT officer_name FROM compliance_officers ORDER BY officer_name DESC;

SELECT r.report_name, s.standard_name, c.officer_name FROM risk_assessment_reports r INNER JOIN regulatory_standards s ON r.report_id = s.standard_id INNER JOIN compliance_officers c ON r.report_id = c.officer_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentReports;
SELECT company_name, industry_sector FROM FintechCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT officer_name, contact_email FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT comment_text, commenter_name FROM ReportComments WHERE comment_id = '456e7890-a12b-34c5-d678-901234512300' AND commenter_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_level FROM ComplianceStandards WHERE compliance_level > 2 ORDER BY compliance_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM FintechCompanies;
SELECT company_id, company_name, establishment_date FROM FintechCompanies ORDER BY establishment_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, establishment_date, industry_sector FROM FintechCompanies WHERE industry_sector = 'Finance';
SELECT officer_name, contact_email, company_name FROM ComplianceOfficers INNER JOIN FintechCompanies ON ComplianceOfficers.company_id = FintechCompanies.company_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM RiskAssessmentReports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
